name: error-with-code
description: Easily throw an error with code. The code may be provided on invocation or preset to be used for all invocations. Furthermore, you may set a string that will be prepended to each error message.
author: derkallevombau

scripts.compile: npm run generateJs && npm run generateDts && npm run generateDoc
scripts.lintCfgTsAdd: git subtree add -P lintcfg-ts --squash "$npm_package_config_lintCfgSubtreeRepoBasePath"ts master && ln -s lintcfg-ts/.eslintrc.js .eslintrc.js
scripts.regenerateDeps: x=package-lock.json; y=node_modules; [ -f $x ] && rm $x; [ -d $y ] && rm -r $y; npm i
